answers.answer: NASH is not inherited.  It is caused from my understanding of too much weight & diabetes can play a big role also.  I know because my brother passed from it this year

question: My mother in law has Nash and so far she is the only one who has it. her sister had kidney Problemsmy question here is can her son my husband get it as well? how high of a risk is he? he is over weigh doesn't drink and is a smoker. i am asking this becasue his mother says oh ya he will get it. she doesnt know for sure so i would like to find out some information so i can put my mind at easethank you
title: Is nash Hereditary?
